818180.name: Tyr: Chains of Valhalla OST
818180.description:
Loved the game? Then why not jam to the music as well? This is the Original Soundtrack of Tyr: Chains of Valhalla. Composed by Andrew Sitkov, the full OST features 30 minutes of music, totaling 15 tracks in all. Also includes unique renditions of some tracks not found in the original game.

Album name: Tyr: Chains of Valhalla
Artist: Andrew Sitkov & José Roberto Alan Ramirez Arguelles
Published by: Ennui Studio
Publication date: 2018

CHECK OUT THE FULL TRACKLIST BELLOW!

01 - Main Theme (01:45)
02 - Comic (03:13)
03 - Odin Lab's Stage (02:01)
04 - Garm Boss (01:36)
05 - Muspelheim Wharehouse Stage (02:08)
06 - Logi Boss (01:36)
07 - Niffelm Lab's Stage (01:50)
08 - Ymir Boss (01:44)
09 - Ygdrassill Corp Stage (02:36)
10 - Nidhogg Boss (01:33)
11 - Midgard Sky City Stage (02:10)
12 - Veorfolnir Boss (01:37)
13 - Angrboda Palace Stage (02:00)
14 - Fenrir Boss (02:01)
15 - Trailer Theme (01:13)
818180.supported_languages:
英语*
*具有完全音频支持的语言
